observers.name: Microsoft Windows
observers.Description: Microsoft Windows endpoint logs include detailed records of system events, security incidents, application activities, and user actions on an endpoint device

source.label: Amazon Cloudtrail Logs
source.description: Amazon CloudTrail logs provide detailed information on AWS API calls, including request parameters, timestamps, and user identities, for auditing and security analysis.

source.label: Amazon Web Application Firewall Logs
source.description: Amazon WAF logs provide detailed information on HTTP requests, blocked or allowed traffic, rule evaluations, and security events.

source.label: Amazon Guardduty Logs
source.description: Amazon Guardduty Logs include security findings related to suspicious activity, unauthorized access, and potential threats detected in AWS environments.

source.label: Amazon Inspector Logs
source.description: Amazon Inspector logs include detailed findings of security vulnerabilities, configuration issues, and compliance violations identified during automated assessments of AWS resources.

source.label: Azure Active Directory (AAD) Audit Logs
source.description: Audit logs include records of all changes made to AAD resources, such as user and group management activities, application updates, and directory configuration changes.

source.label: Azure Active Directory (AAD) Sign-in logs
source.description: Sign-in logs include information about user sign-in activities, such as user identity, timestamp, sign-in status, IP address, client application used, and location.

source.label: Azure Active Directory (AAD) Activity logs
source.description: Activity logs include details on user sign-ins, application usage, administrative activities, conditional access, and risk detections.

source.label: Office-365 Logs
source.description: O365 audit logs include records of user and administrator activities such as logins, file access, changes to settings, and mailbox operations across various Office 365 services

source.label: Checkpoint Firewall
source.description: Checkpoint Firewall logs

source.label: Cisco Meraki Firewall
source.description: Cisco Meraki Firewall logs

source.label: Cisco Firepower Threat Defense (FTD)
source.description: Cisco Firepower Threat Defense (FTD) logs

source.label: Cisco ASA Firewall
source.description: Cisco ASA firewall logs

source.label: Eagle Firewall
source.description: Eagle firewall logs

source.label: Fortinet Fortigate Firewall
source.description: Fortinet Fortigate firewall logs

source.label: PaloAlto Firewall
source.description: PaloAlto firewall logs

source.label: Sophos XG Firewall
source.description: Sophos XG Firewall logs

source.label: Sophos Intercept X Endpoint Logs
source.description: Sophos Intercept X Endpoint logs

source.label: Cyber 2.0 Logs
source.description: Cyber 2.0 logs

source.label: Crowdstrike Falcon Logs
source.description: Crowdstrike Falcon logs

source.label: SentinelOne Endpoint Protection Logs
source.description: SentinelOne Endpoint Protection logs

source.label: Seqrite AV Logs
source.description: Seqrite AV logs

source.label: Symantec Endpoint Security Logs
source.description: Symantec Endpoint Security logs

source.label: Kaspersky Endpoint Security Logs
source.description: Kaspersky Endpoint Security logs

source.label: Cisco Duo Logs
source.description: Cisco Duo logs include detailed records of user authentication attempts, including information on login success or failure, user and device details, and associated security events

source.label: OneLogin Logs
source.description: OneLogin logs include authentication events, user activity, login attempts, system errors, and administrative actions.

source.label: Cisco Identity Services Engine (ISE) Logs
source.description: Cisco ISE logs include authentication and authorization events, policy decisions, system alerts, and user activity records.

source.label: Quality Network Appliance Provider (QNAP) Logs
source.description: Array Network Loadbalancer logs

source.label: IBM Storwize Logs
source.description: IBM Storwize logs

source.label: Dell CloudIQ Logs
source.description: Dell CloudIQ logs

source.label: Amazon ElasticLoad Balancer (ELB) Logs
source.description: Amazon ElasticLoad Balancer logs provide detailed information on HTTP/S request activities, including client IPs, request paths, response statuses, and latency metrics for monitoring and analysis.

source.label: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Loadbalancer
source.description: GCP Loadbalancer logs include details on traffic flow, request and response attributes, and error rates, offering insights into load balancing performance and network traffic patterns.

source.label: Array Networks
source.description: Array Network Loadbalancer logs include traffic patterns, load balancing decisions, session information, and health checks for monitoring.

source.label: Mimecast Email Security Logs
source.description: Mimecast Email Security Logs include detailed records of email transactions, filtering actions, and security events related to spam, malware, and policy enforcement.

source.label: Zscaler Internet Access (ZIA) Logs
source.description: Zscaler Internet Access (ZIA) logs include detailed records of web traffic, user activities, and security events, such as URL requests, and threat detections.

source.label: Liferay CMS Logs
source.description: Liferay CMS logs includes user activities, system errors, access requests, and configuration changes.

source.label: Microsoft SQL Server Logs
source.description: Microsoft SQL Server logs

source.label: Oracle Database Logs
source.description: Oracle Database logs

source.label: Linux Auditd
source.description: Auditd logs include detailed records of system calls, file accesses, authentication attempts, and other security-relevant events for auditing and monitoring purposes.

source.label: Linux
source.description: Linux syslog logs include system messages related to kernel activity, system processes, authentication events, and application logs.

source.label: IBM Remote Management Service (RMS)
source.description: IBM RMS logs include system configuration changes, hardware diagnostics, firmware updates, and remote management activities, insights into the status

source.label: Cisco Remote Management Service (RMS)
source.description: Cisco RMS logs include system status information, configuration changes, and remote access activities for network devices.

source.label: Lenovo Remote Management Service (RMS)
source.description: Lenovo RMS logs include hardware diagnostics, firmware updates, system health status, and configuration changes.

source.label: HPE Remote Management Service (RMS)
source.description: HPE RMS logs include hardware health alerts, configuration changes, firmware updates, and system status information.

source.label: Dell Remote Management Service (RMS)
source.description: Dell RMS logs include system health status, hardware events, firmware changes, and remote management actions.

source.label: Citrix NetScaler Logs
source.description: Citrix NetScaler logs include system events, traffic data, error messages, and performance metrics related to the operation of the NetScaler appliance.

source.label: Nutanix HCI Logs
source.description: Nutanix HCI logs include detailed information on cluster health, virtual machine activities, hardware performance, and system events for comprehensive monitoring and troubleshooting.

source.label: Amazon VPC Flow Logs
source.description: Amazon VPC-Flow logs capture and send detailed records of network traffic flow within and between VPCs, including source and destination IP addresses, ports, and traffic acceptance or rejection.

source.label: Flow Data
source.description: Flow logs encompass detailed records of network traffic, including source and destination IPs, ports, protocols, and traffic volume.

source.label: Network Analysis Framework (NAF)
source.description: NAF includes logs of network traffic, system performance metrics, and security events to monitor and analyze network behavior and anomalies.

source.label: Packet Analysis Framework (PAF)
source.description: PAF includes logs of network traffic, packet details, protocol interactions, and traffic anomalies.

source.label: HPE Aruba Switch
source.description: HPE Aruba Switch logs include details on network traffic, switch port activity, configuration changes, and system events.

source.label: Brocade Switch
source.description: Brocade Switch logs include details on network traffic, switch port activity, configuration changes, and system events.

source.label: Ruckus Switch
source.description: Ruckus Switch logs include details on network traffic, port status, configuration changes, and system events.

source.label: Cisco Wireless Control System (WCS) Logs
source.description: Cisco Wireless Control System (WCS) logs include detailed records of access points, wireless clients, network events, and system performance metrics.

source.label: Ruckus Wireless Controller Logs
source.description: Ruckus Wireless Controller logs include detailed records of wireless network activities, configuration changes, client connections, and system events.

source.label: HPE Aruba Wireless Logs
source.description: HPE Aruba Wireless logs include detailed records of wireless network activity, including access points' status, client connections, authentication events, and system events.

observers.name: Fallback (New Log Source)
observers.Description: Use this pipeline; if the required product is not listed, it will be classified as a new log source, and a parser will be created accordingly
